Rooms.FlavourText: You are in a dungeon. A goblin stares at you menacingly.
Rooms.Question: The Goblin charges toward you, blade drawn. Do you:

Choices.Outcome: You parry the goblin's strike, and cleave it in two, but not before it nicks you with a hidden blade.
You sprint towards the nearest exit, outpacing the goblin easily

Rooms.FlavourText: You pass through the exit and run down a corridorâ€¦
Rooms.Question: At the end of the corridor, you find two doors and must pass through one of them. Do you:

Choices.Text: Go through the right hand door
Choices.Outcome: You fall down a 3 meter drop on the other side, slightly injuring your ankle. You climb out of the hole and into an open courtyard.

Choices.Text: Go through the left hand door
Choices.Outcome: The door locks behind you and you are in an open courtyard.

Rooms.FlavourText: You see a table with food and drink
Rooms.Question: You are tired, hungry and thirsty. Do you:

Choices.Outcome: You recover from your injuries and you are ready to move to the next room

Choices.Text: Ignore the table of refreshments, fearing poison and move on to the next room
Choices.Outcome: Your injuries and fatigue cause you to fall into a bed of hemlock. You die. Horribly. Ouch!

Rooms.FlavourText: You are now in a beer cellar. You are tempted to try the merchandise.
Rooms.Question: The barkeep offers you a beer. Do you:

Choices.Outcome: One beer is never enough and you get horribly drunk, in your haze, you stagger off

Choices.Text: Decline and ask for directions to the W.C.
Choices.Outcome: You reach the W.C. and have a wash.

Rooms.FlavourText: You reach a library. You see the librarian, who is an orangutan, hanging around the desk.
Rooms.Question: The librarian says 'OOOK?' Do you:

Choices.Text: Return the book you borrowed last time you were here and apologise for being late.
Choices.Outcome: Your apology is accepted, so you live, but there is no excuse for your tardiness and you are fined 10 Splodges

Choices.Text: Borrow the book eagerly recommended by the librarian, as this is your first visit and you wish to impress
Choices.Outcome: You put the book in your bag and walk towards the exit
